channel.title: Clan section; would you use it?
channel.description:
[u][b]The intro:[/b][/u] A few people have requested a clan section (Or close enough thats what they asked for). I'd like to take a poll and discuss whether this is a good idea and if it will be worth it. If we get a lot of positive feedback then perhaps we can go ahead and create a clan section.
[u][b]The idea:[/b][/u] Create a clan section that can be used for any game. Recruitment and discussion would both be part of this section. For example if you would like to create a Runescape clan you could post a new thread and post requirements and activities you would do. Or another example would be for Counter Strike (I know this game is very popular and there is already a clan that is linked to Moparisthebest from IRC (Juden?)) and you could advertise the official servers you use and the rules of game play that you play by.
So good idea? Bad? Well it can't be much worse than the Neopets section can it?
Let’s hear your opinion!
